messages.title: An alliance – between the SNP who would break up Britain, and Labour who would bankrupt us – can only be avoided by voting Conservative locally.

issues.governance: SNP who would break up Britain

quotes.text: SNP leader Nicola Sturgeon has said she would prop up a Labour government, even if the Tories finished the election as the largest party by up to 40 seats.

images.caption: A campaign message warning against an alliance between SNP and Labour.
